text.0: three spheres of light o varuṇa three heavens three firmaments ye comprehend o mitra.
text.1: waxed strong ye keep the splendour of dominion guarding the ordinance that lasts for ever.
text.2: ye varuṇa have kine who yield refreshment mitra your floods pour water full of sweetness.
text.3: there stand the three steers splendid in their brightness who fill the three worldbowls with genial moisture.
text.4: i call at dawn on aditi the goddess i call at noon and when the sun is setting.
text.5: i pray o mitravaruṇa for safety for wealth and progeny in rest and trouble.
text.6: ye who uphold the region sphere of brightness ye who support earths realm divine Ādityas.
text.7: the immortal gods o varuṇa and mitra never impair your everlasting statutes.
